data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Lijie, Li, Wenzhu, Zhang, Yalin, Yang, Xingke (2008): A new species of genus Aplosonyx Chevrolat (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae) from China, with a key to the Chinese known species. Zootaxa 1898: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184475
